testlink.api.java.client
Class TestLinkAPIHelper

java.lang.Object
  testlink.api.java.client.TestLinkAPIHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
TestLinkAPIConst
public class TestLinkAPIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements TestLinkAPIConst

This class contains a collection of helper methods that can be used to compliment the TestLink API available methods.
